name: Save The City
description:
Save The City is a unique platformer style game for android that you'll love.There is this gang of psycho gangsters lighting the cities on fire and they don't came where are they going to live after all the cities on this planet are burned down, You'll play as a firefighter your job is pretty simple Save The City These little psychopaths have done enough already to destroy the human race and one more thing these guys stink because they hate water they've never taken a bath in their life time.

30 exciting levels

Water made up of physics
